question: A sum of 3200 Rs. invested at 10% per annum compounded quarterly amounts to 3362 Rs. Compute the time period.
explanation:
$latex A = P \\left ( 1+\\frac{R}{100} \\right )^{T}&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{3362}{3200} = \\left ( 1+\\frac{10}{400} \\right )^{4t}&s=1$
$latex => \\frac{1681}{1600} = \\left ( \\frac{41}{40} \\right )^{4t}&s=1$
$latex => \\left ( \\frac{41}{40} \\right )^{2} = \\left ( \\frac{41}{40} \\right )^{4t}&s=1$
$latex => 4t = 2,\\ t = \\frac{1}{2}\\ year&s=1$
Hence option [A] is correct answer.
